Articles.Content:
So, my first ever time on Photoshop CS5 for about 10 minutes when I decided to try and make Jool, the green Gas Giant of Kerbol.

So using some time (What, about 1 - 2 hours?) I've created, THIS.

Feast your eyes on it.

P.S : I'm not sure on how to size it down, heh, it's ah....pretty massive.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹

So, as I said, after 10 minutes on Photoshop CS5 doing nothing, I decided to create Jool, so I went on with it and with-in about 1 - 2 hours I've created this.

Also, I've added rings, I don't know why, maybe it could happen in later patches, it doesn't matter anyway. It is also completely scratch....everything, the Starfield, the Gas Giant and even the rings, Oh, and the Lens flare (including moons).

Edited October 6, 2012 by Munstation

Well, that's a nice picture! Good work for just having 10 minutes of experience

Cheers!
